definitions.title: Pi. Impf.
definitions.body: 3 ms. [[ויתו]] Kt, [[וַוְתָיו]] Qr 1Sa 21:14 (Ges:§ 75 bb) and he made marks on ([[עַל]]) the doors: but < LXX Vulgate Th We Dr Ges:l. c. and most [[וַ֫יׇּתָף]] he drummed (v. [[תפף]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: [[וְהִתְוִ֫יתָ תָו עַל־]] Ez Eze 9:4 set a mark (acc. cogn.) upon.
